    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/parents/adam-levine-behati-prinsloo-welcome-another-daughter-t123349?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Adam Levine and Behati Prinsloo welcome another daughter</title>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:54:35 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/parents/adam-levine-behati-prinsloo-welcome-another-daughter-t123349?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Gina Vivinetto</dc:creator>
      <description>The Maroon 5 singer and his Victoria's Secret model wife are now parents to two little girls.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318804/adam-levine-behati-prinsloo-today-180216-tease_5053e56563557402cb0165f5866c77e1.jpg" medium="image" height="1407" width="2500">
        <media:credit>David Livingston</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Adam Levine, Behati Prinsloo<media:description type="plain">Recording artist Adam Levine (L) and wife model Behati Prinsloo attend his being honored with a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on February 10, 2017 in Hollywood, California.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318805/adam-levine-behati-prinsloo-today-180216_5053e56563557402cb0165f5866c77e1.jpg" medium="image" height="1903" width="2500">
        <media:credit>David Livingston</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Adam Levine (L) and wife model Behati Prinsloo<media:description type="plain">The happy couple are now mom and dad to two little girls.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/popculture/roseanne-revival-was-being-home-again-show-s-stars-t123338?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>'Roseanne' revival was 'like being home again' for show's stars</title>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 19:37:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/popculture/roseanne-revival-was-being-home-again-show-s-stars-t123338?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Gina Vivinetto</dc:creator>
      <description>The cast of "Roseanne" opened up about what it was like to have the Conner family back together again during Thursday's special episode of "20/20."</description>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_01/1304796/roseanne-cast-today-171217-tease-01_b62087d3c588321393f682f54020838c.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Adam Rose</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">ABC's "Roseanne"<media:description type="plain">The cast of "Roseanne" reunites for the show's upcoming revival.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media2.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_02/1309479/roseanne-today-180109-08_c9b8dcfb7721dc72cb333094a56abb9d.jpg" medium="image" height="2000" width="3000">
        <media:credit>ABC</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">ROSEANNE BARR, JOHN GOODMAN<media:description type="plain">"Roseanne" stars John Goodman and Roseanne Barr in a scene from the show's upcoming revival.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media2.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_02/1309475/roseanne-today-180109-04_c9b8dcfb7721dc72cb333094a56abb9d.jpg" medium="image" height="2000" width="3000">
        <media:credit>ABC</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">SARA GILBERT, LAURIE METCALF, ROSEANNE BARR<media:description type="plain">Sara Gilbert, Laurie Metcalf and Roseanne Barr in a scene from the upcoming "Roseanne" revival.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media2.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318750/roseanne-reboot-today-inline-180216_37724f15c8f43be191ca59df1ac08e4e.jpg" medium="image" height="1667" width="2500">
        <media:credit>ABC</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">LECY GORANSON, SARAH CHALKE<media:description type="plain">Lecy Goranson, the original Becky Conner, shares a scene with Sarah Chalke, or "Becky No. 2.," as "Roseanne" fans call her, in the show's upcoming revival.
</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/series/love-your-body/shonda-rhimes-new-dove-project-redefining-beauty-tv-t114427?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Shonda Rhimes on learning to love her body: 'I spent so much time picking it apart'</title>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 17:29:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/series/love-your-body/shonda-rhimes-new-dove-project-redefining-beauty-tv-t114427?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Rheana Murray</dc:creator>
      <description>She opened up about how the definition of beauty is changing in Hollywood.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media2.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1269386/shonda-rhimes-today-tease-170801_c65b8bcd5eb807dd99df7d4a5e66079a.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Jason LaVeris</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">ABC's "Scandal" 100th Episode Celebration - Arrivals<media:description type="plain">Shonda Rhimes celebrates the 100th episode of "Scandal" in April.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media2.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1269386/shonda-rhimes-today-tease-170801_c65b8bcd5eb807dd99df7d4a5e66079a.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Jason LaVeris</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">ABC's "Scandal" 100th Episode Celebration - Arrivals<media:description type="plain">Shonda Rhimes celebrates the 100th episode of "Scandal" in April.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2017_31/1269384/shonda-rhimes-today-inline2-170801_148225e5512f883bc22fea1685b0a749.jpg" medium="image" height="3807" width="2500">
        <media:credit>C Flanigan</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Image: 2017 Vanity Fair Oscar Party Hosted By Graydon Carter - Arrivals, Shonda Rhimes<media:description type="plain">Shonda Rhimes is redefining beauty with help from Dove. "Frankly, the idea that we need to be beautiful, if you really think about it, it's odd," she told TODAY Style. </media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/health/jennifer-aniston-justin-theroux-announce-breakup-why-we-care-t123337?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Not Jen and Justin! Why celebrity breakups feel so personal</title>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 17:26:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/health/jennifer-aniston-justin-theroux-announce-breakup-why-we-care-t123337?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Gabrielle Frank</dc:creator>
      <description>Breakup bombshells like this can make us worry about the state of marriage itself, and the ability of anyone to stay together.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media4.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318746/jen-and-justin-today-tease-180216_e687ca97f037d2f6408e1494d46a17dd.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>WireImage</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">2017 Vanity Fair Oscar Party Hosted By Graydon Carter - Arrivals<media:description type="plain">BEVERLY HILLS, CA - FEBRUARY 26: Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux attend the 2017 Vanity Fair Oscar Party hosted by Graydon Carter at Wallis Annenberg Center for the Performing Arts on February 26, 2017 in Beverly Hills, California.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/parents/bachelor-paradise-stars-carly-waddell-evan-bass-welcome-baby-t123335?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>

        <media:credit>Instagram / @carlywad</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Bachelor in Paradise stars welcome baby<media:description type="plain">Bachelor in Paradise stars welcome baby</media:description></media:text>

    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/popculture/jason-priestley-reveals-his-favorite-beverly-hills-90210-storyline-t123098?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Jason Priestley reveals his favorite 'Beverly Hills, 90210' storyline</title>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 16:28:22 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/popculture/jason-priestley-reveals-his-favorite-beverly-hills-90210-storyline-t123098?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Erin Clements</dc:creator>
      <description>Jason Priestley shared some of his "Beverly Hills, 90210" memories in an interview with TODAY.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media1.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1317941/jason-priestley-today-tease-180213_1d9b8a64624355a0831291bad7883439.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Everett</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">BEVERLY HILLS, 90210, 1990-2000, Shannen Doherty, Luke Perry, Tori Spelling, Brian-Austin Green, Jen<media:description type="plain">BEVERLY HILLS, 90210, Shannen Doherty, Luke Perry, Tori Spelling, Brian-Austin Green, Jennie Garth, Jason Priestley, Gabrielle Carteris, Ian Ziering, (1991), 1990-2000.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1317940/jason-priestley-today-inline-180213_1d9b8a64624355a0831291bad7883439.jpg" medium="image" height="1674" width="2500">
        <media:credit>Everett</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">BEVERLY HILLS, 90210, 1990-2000, Jason Priestley, Shannen Doherty, Tori Spelling, Ian Ziering, Jenni<media:description type="plain">Jason Priestley, Shannen Doherty, Tori Spelling, Ian Ziering and Jennie Garth graduate from West Beverly High in 1993.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media1.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1317941/jason-priestley-today-tease-180213_1d9b8a64624355a0831291bad7883439.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Everett</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">BEVERLY HILLS, 90210, 1990-2000, Shannen Doherty, Luke Perry, Tori Spelling, Brian-Austin Green, Jen<media:description type="plain"></media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>

    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/news/lindsey-vonn-contemplates-hollywood-after-winter-olympics-run-t123313?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Lindsey Vonn, the actress? Skier contemplates show business after Olympics</title>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 13:56:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/news/lindsey-vonn-contemplates-hollywood-after-winter-olympics-run-t123313?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Lindsey Ashcraft and Eun Kyung Kim</dc:creator>
      <description>Alpine skier Lindsey Vonn said Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson will help her out in Hollywood — but first, she has some business at the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media1.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318648/lindsey-vonn-today-tease-001-180216_9b69cd002f48a2a7ef27e9368037a9bd.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>TODAY</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Lindsey Vonn<media:description type="plain">Lindsey Vonn</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media1.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318672/lindsay-vonn-today-main-2-180216_38ff97cd7d97bfcc3d32bd77780392ac.jpg" medium="image" height="1200" width="2400">
        <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Image: Around the Games: Day 0 - Winter Olympic Games<media:description type="plain">Is Hollywood in the cards for skier Lindsey Vonn? Maybe, she revealed on TODAY.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media1.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318647/lindsey-vonn-today-tease-002-180216_9b69cd002f48a2a7ef27e9368037a9bd.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>TODAY</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Lindsey Vonn and Savannah Guthrie<media:description type="plain">Lindsey Vonn opens up about her goals for the Olympics and beyond.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media4.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318656/lindsey-vonn-today-tease-004-180216_7bf2d927b4356a85a2f959c3abf7218b.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>TODAY</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Lindsey Vonn<media:description type="plain">Lindsey Vonn contemplates her long list of injuries over her career.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/popculture/jennifer-aniston-justin-theroux-announce-separation-t123305?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux announce separation</title>
      <pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 23:36:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/popculture/jennifer-aniston-justin-theroux-announce-separation-t123305?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Shane Lou</dc:creator>
      <description>The couple said in a statement Thursday that they reached a mutual decision to split after two and a half years of marriage.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2017_17/1210405/justin-theroux-jennifer-aniston-today-170426-tease_82d40f5a1ade8b3502e25c270b9d2b74.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Stephane Cardinale</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Jennifer Aniston, Justin Theroux<media:description type="plain">Justin Theroux and Jennifer Aniston attend the Festival Serie Mania Opening Night, at Le Grand Rex on April 13, 2017 in Paris, France.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media1.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2017_19/1213558/jennifer-aniston-justin-theroux-today-170510_806908112b5efb5f30f102667c0a3fbf.jpg" medium="image" height="1666" width="2500">
        <media:credit>AFP - Getty Images</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Justin Theroux, Jennifer Aniston<media:description type="plain">Theroux and Aniston in 2017.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2017_17/1210405/justin-theroux-jennifer-aniston-today-170426-tease_82d40f5a1ade8b3502e25c270b9d2b74.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Stephane Cardinale</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Jennifer Aniston, Justin Theroux<media:description type="plain">Theroux and Aniston, who turned 49 earlier this week, worked together on the 2012 comedy "Wanderlust."</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/popculture/watch-trailer-youtube-s-new-karate-kid-series-cobra-kai-t123302?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Ralph Macchio has unfinished business in trailer for new 'Karate Kid' series</title>
      <pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 20:40:36 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/popculture/watch-trailer-youtube-s-new-karate-kid-series-cobra-kai-t123302?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Gina Vivinetto</dc:creator>
      <description>High school may have been 30 years ago, but the rivalry between Daniel LaRusso (Ralph Macchio) and Johnny Lawrence (William Zabka) is about to reignite.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318555/karate-kid-today-tease-1-180215_73d061ddb8bda3d23087a1ea35547b87.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Everett</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">THE KARATE KID<media:description type="plain">THE KARATE KID US 1984 COLUMBIA PICTURES WILLIAM ZABKA RALPH MACCHIO Date 1984</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media2.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318561/new-karate-kid-today-inline-180215_0b7ff8580de2505fe69cd9a567653112.jpg" medium="image" height="2500" width="4286">
        <media:credit>YouTube</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Cobra Kai<media:description type="plain">"Cobra Kai" stars William Zabka, left, and Ralph Macchio engage in another showdown.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.today.com/popculture/tom-hanks-surprises-couple-responding-wedding-invitation-t123280?cid=public-rss_20180218</guid>
      <title>Tom Hanks surprises couple by responding to wedding invitation</title>
      <pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 19:34:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/popculture/tom-hanks-surprises-couple-responding-wedding-invitation-t123280?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Aliyah Frumin</dc:creator>
      <description>Kristen Jerkins said she was shocked when she heard from Tom Hanks after sending him an invitation to her wedding.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media1.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318464/tom-hanks-wedding-invite-today-tease-180215_8f4269326432cb2826c11e6c03d9c865.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Kristen Jerkins</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Tom Hanks response<media:description type="plain">Tom Hanks response</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media2.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318509/image1_bb080f553d89ad8ac5c34383c7cd8d91.jpeg" medium="image" height="713" width="679">
        <media:credit>Courtesy of Kristen Jerkins.</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Tom Hanks responded to Kristen Jerkins of Nashville, Tenn. when she sent the movie star a wedding invitation.<media:description type="plain">Tom Hanks sent this letter to fan Kristen Jerkins, who had invited the star to her wedding.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media4.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318511/image2_7f9ec517084c2ce93c715a68c0f0729e.jpeg" medium="image" height="500" width="636">
        <media:credit>Courtesy of Kristen Jerkins.</media:credit>

      <title>Sorry, but those Canadian ice dancers aren't actually dating (but they did once)</title>
      <pubDate>Wed, 14 Feb 2018 20:28:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https://www.today.com/news/sorry-those-canadian-ice-dancers-aren-t-actually-dating-t123227?cid=public-rss_20180218</link>
      <dc:creator>Scott Stump</dc:creator>
      <description>Tessa Virtue and Scott Moir's red hot on-ice chemistry has many convinced they're a couple in real life.</description>
      <media:content url="http://media4.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318285/tessa-and-scott-today-tease-180214_5eae60c8bf7913b7d22ff33cf65dce9f.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Image: TOPSHOT-FSKATING-OLY-2018-PYEONGCHANG<media:description type="plain">TOPSHOT - Canada's Tessa Virtue and Canada's Scott Moir compete in the figure skating team event ice dance free dance during the Pyeongchang 2018 Winter Olympic Games at the Gangneung Ice Arena in Gangneung on February 12, 2018.</media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
      <media:content url="http://media4.s-nbcnews.com/i/newscms/2018_07/1318285/tessa-and-scott-today-tease-180214_5eae60c8bf7913b7d22ff33cf65dce9f.jpg" medium="image" height="1080" width="1920">
        <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        <media:text type="plain">Image: TOPSHOT-FSKATING-OLY-2018-PYEONGCHANG<media:description type="plain">Oh, Canada's Tessa Virtue and Scott Moir? They're just friends. </media:description></media:text>
      </media:content>
    </item>
